languages.text: "Я знаю иной способ тебе помочь. Тот, при котором тебе больше не надо будет сражаться с голосами. Стань с ними едина".
"I know of another way to help you. One that will spare you from having to fight the voices ever again. Become one with them."
languages.original_text: "Я знаю иной способ тебе помочь. Тот, при котором тебе больше не надо будет сражаться с голосами. Стань с ними едина".

traits.locale_text: "I know of another way to help you. One that will spare you from having to fight the voices ever again. Become one with them."
"I know of another way to help you. One that will spare you from having to fight the voices ever again. Become one with them."
"I know of another way to help you. One that will spare you from having to fight the voices ever again. Become one with them."
"I know of another way to help you. One that will spare you from having to fight the voices ever again. Become one with them."
"I know of another way to help you. One that will spare you from having to fight the voices ever again. Become one with them."

languages.text: “我知道有另一种方法可以帮助你。只要你和那些声音融为一体，就不再需要和那些声音争斗不休了。”
languages.original_text: "I know of another way to help you. One that will spare you from having to fight the voices ever again. Become one with them."

traits.locale_text: “我知道有另一种方法可以帮助你。只要你和那些声音融为一体，就不再需要和那些声音争斗不休了。”

languages.text: «Conozco otra forma de ayudarla. Una que evitará que tenga que volver a luchar contra las voces. Puede unirse a ellas».
languages.original_text: "I know of another way to help you. One that will spare you from having to fight the voices ever again. Become one with them."

traits.locale_text: «Conozco otra forma de ayudarla. Una que evitará que tenga que volver a luchar contra las voces. Puede unirse a ellas».

languages.text: "Ich weiß noch eine andere Möglichkeit, Euch zu helfen. Eine, durch die Ihr nie wieder gegen die Stimmen ankämpfen müsst. Werdet eins mit ihnen."
languages.original_text: "I know of another way to help you. One that will spare you from having to fight the voices ever again. Become one with them."

traits.locale_text: "Ich weiß noch eine andere Möglichkeit, Euch zu helfen. Eine, durch die Ihr nie wieder gegen die Stimmen ankämpfen müsst. Werdet eins mit ihnen."

languages.text: 「お前を助ける別の方法がある。もう二度と『声』と戦わなくてすむ方法だ。彼らとひとつになればいい」
languages.original_text: "I know of another way to help you. One that will spare you from having to fight the voices ever again. Become one with them."

traits.locale_text: 「お前を助ける別の方法がある。もう二度と『声』と戦わなくてすむ方法だ。彼らとひとつになればいい」

languages.text: « Je connais un autre moyen de vous aider. Un moyen qui vous épargnera d'avoir à combattre les voix : ne faire plus qu'une avec elles. »
languages.original_text: "I know of another way to help you. One that will spare you from having to fight the voices ever again. Become one with them."

traits.locale_text: « Je connais un autre moyen de vous aider. Un moyen qui vous épargnera d'avoir à combattre les voix : ne faire plus qu'une avec elles. »

languages.text: "Sana yardım edebileceğim bir yol daha biliyorum. Seslerle bir daha savaşmamanı sağlayacak bir yol. Onlarla bir ol."
languages.original_text: "I know of another way to help you. One that will spare you from having to fight the voices ever again. Become one with them."

traits.locale_text: "Sana yardım edebileceğim bir yol daha biliyorum. Seslerle bir daha savaşmamanı sağlayacak bir yol. Onlarla bir ol."
